mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gmair_install.install_assign(assign_id, code_value, team_id, member_id, assign_status, assign_date, block_flag, create_time, consumer_consignee, consumer_phone, consumer_address) VALUES (#{assignId}, #{codeValue}, #{teamId}, #{memberId}, #{assignStatus,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{assignDate}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt}, #{consumerConsignee}, #{consumerPhone}, #{consumerAddress})
mapper.update:
UPDATE gmair_install.install_assign
assign_id = #{assignId},
code_value = #{codeValue},
team_id = #{teamId},
member_id = #{memberId},
assign_status = #{assignStatus,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
assign_date = #{assignDate},
block_flag = #{blockFlag},
consumer_consignee = #{consumerConsignee},
consumer_phone = #{consumerPhone},
consumer_address = #{consumerAddress},
assign_id = #{assignId}
WHERE assign_id = #{assignId}
